document.full_text: syria, in a policy reversal, has offered to cooperate fully with the u.n. atomic agency, which wants to inspect a suspected nuclear reactor site that was bombed by israeli warplanes in 2007, diplomats said.
document.title: under pressure, syria offers nuclear cooperation
lines_and_colors: syria, in a policy reversal, has offered to cooperate fully with the u.n. atomic agency, which wants to inspect a suspected nuclear reactor site that was bombed by israeli warplanes in 2007, diplomats said.
